title: Stage Builder Pro
description: Stage Builder Pro is a cutting-edge Blueprint tool that simplifies building customizable Virtual Production and VFX stages. Ideal for pre-viz, tech-viz, and IR marker setups, it allows users to create fully customizable stage environments in minutes.
longDescription:
Stage Builder Pro â€“ Your Ultimate Solution for Building Customizable Virtual Production & VFX Stages in Minutes!


Stage Builder Pro, is an innovative Blueprint tool designed to enhance pre-viz, tech-viz, and virtual production workflows. In a world where precision, flexibility, and fast iteration are critical, Stage Builder Pro simplifies the process of setting up and visualizing your ideal studio stage.


🔧 Key Features

  • Full Customization: Quickly create a virtual production or VFX stage with adjustable dimensions (length, width, height) to suit any project, from large-scale studios to compact setups.
  • Chroma Key Variety: Easily switch between green, blue, or custom chroma paint options, perfectly tailoring the stage for any scenario or visual effects needs.
  • Dynamic Marker Placement: Add track markers in linear or zigzag patterns, essential for precise motion tracking and studio floor planning.
  • Advanced IR Marker Integration: Built-in support for multiple IR marker types, including Mo-Sys StarTracker, Stype RedSpy, and Default Reflective Markers. This ensures compatibility with industry-standard tracking solutions, allowing you to lay out your studio and markers with pinpoint accuracy.
  • Support Structures & Trusses: Add trusses, grids, and central support systems that replicate real-world VFX studio floors with high precision, allowing for a virtual stage layout that mirrors scanning techniques for accurate replication and visualization.
  • Pre-viz & Tech-viz Focus: Whether for quick client presentations or complex technical demonstrations, Stage Builder Pro allows you to pre-visualize entire studio setups, ensuring team alignment before entering the physical setup phase. This streamlines communication and reduces potential setup errors.


With Stage Builder Pro, you can not only optimize your virtual production or VFX setups but also experiment with different configurations, ensuring everything from marker placement to tracking and calibration is perfect before the cameras roll. The ultimate tool for creating, visualizing, and customizing studio setups for anyone in the virtual production and VFX industries.

Features:

  • Full Customization: Quickly create a virtual production or VFX stage with adjustable dimensions (length, width, height) to suit any project, from large-scale studios to compact setups.
  • Chroma Key Variety: Easily switch between green, blue, or custom chroma paint options, perfectly tailoring the stage for any scenario or visual effects needs.
  • Dynamic Marker Placement: Add track markers in linear or zigzag patterns, essential for precise motion tracking and studio floor planning.
  • Advanced IR Marker Integration: Built-in support for multiple IR marker types, including Mo-Sys StarTracker, Stype RedSpy, and Default Reflective Markers.
  • Support Structures & Trusses: Add trusses, grids, and central support systems that replicate real-world VFX studio floors with high precision, allowing for a virtual stage layout that mirrors scanning techniques for accurate replication and visualization.


Number of Blueprints: 1

Input: NA

Network Replicated: Yes (Can Be Configured)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://shorturl.at/H3Ur3

Video Tutorial and Overview: https://youtu.be/6PeaF9G0xO4

Important/Additional Notes: This tool can be used in multiple use cases but is intended specifically for visualization purposes. The Tracking markers and IR system pre-sets doesn't belong to any official support of the practical tracking system hardware.
